Text:
All units (except ships) size decrease.
Convert wall to gate cost decreased.
Trebuchets range increase, no longer fire at units (can fire at ground).
Rams only hold 8 rather than 16 units.
Mangonels no longer need to unpack to fire. Aim time slightly increased to offset this perk.
All gunpoweder civs have access to canon. but costs slightly more than french variant
All civs have 400 pop cap - villagers cost 2 pop to prevent too much resources.
Empire Mode spawns more villagers.
Wonders can be built even if not a victory condition.
Capitals are now also trade posts.
